I'm so overwhelmed with sadness, I don't know what to do.

Summarize the following article into 5-6 sentences The more scientists study diet and nutrition, the more they understand how important dietary sodium is for overall health. Sodium is an essential nutrient and is a primary electrolyte in the body. It’s needed to regulate hormones and fluids and to maintain acid balance. It also aids in the transmission of nerve impulses, helps muscles contract and relax, and helps stabilize blood pressure. Too little sodium – hyponatremia – can be life-threatening, while an imbalance in sodium-potassium levels can lead to other health problems.

Provide a brief summary of the article "A Brief History of the Automobile Industry".

Summarize the events in the following short story. Adam was walking home from school one day when he came across a bird struggling to get out of some mud. He stopped to help the bird, but the bird flew away before he could reach him. He continued down the street when he saw a cat meowing for help. This time he was able to help the cat out and to his surprise, the cat followed him all the way home.
